macro.name: BAUD
macro.description: Serial communication baud rate, defaults to 9600.

macro.name: BITS
macro.description: Serial communication number of bits, defaults to 8.

macro.name: PARITY
macro.description: Serial communication parity, defaults to none.

macro.name: STOP
macro.description: Serial communication stop bit, defaults to 1.

macro.name: INST
macro.description: Instrument (affects communication protocol). Defaults to merlin.

macro.name: MHZ
macro.description: Chopper crystal frequency in MHz. Should be 50.4 on merlin and 18.0 on maps. Defaults to 50.4.
